metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4168 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
(1) iodined.c and (2) user.c in iodine before 0.7.0 allows remote attackersto bypass authentication by continuing execution after an error has beentriggering.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4168` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

iodine - 0.6.0~rc1-19
No subscription required

criterions.comment: iodine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.0~rc1-19').
